comment: Professor Weinstein's Intro TV Writing class is awesome! You spend the semester writing a pilot script, watching popular TV pilots to analyze what can work in your pilot script, and there are in-class table reads of your script by classmates. She gives great feedback on your script/idea, grades fairly, and genuinely cares about all the students.

shes really cool and down to earth. had her for summer on zoom. required cameras on and mic. you just read some famous movie scripts, watched a couple of movies then take a quiz on them. 
-you write your own script. honestly pretty easy. the class acts out your script such a cool feeling tbh 

take her.

I had Professor Weinstein a few semesters ago and have not forgotten her excellent feedback and lectures. She pushed me to write a short film that I ended up being very proud of, and I really appreciate all of her advice and support!

Take her! She is awesome and the class is SO interesting. It is co-listed as FILM3250 and focuses on women directors. The readings are interesting and you will watch movies of various genres and eras. Weekly discussion, one analysis project, midterm and final. Easy grader with quick feedback/grades. Accessible outside of class. One of KSU's best!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Very sweet lady, but the class is a LOT of work, 10+ movies, discussion post for each module, midterm, final, and a final project, but if you like film, you'll like the class a lot.

Professor Weinstein is by far one of the best film professors at Kennesaw. She makes your work feel important and wants her students to succeed. I learned more about film in this class than in any other. If you take this class, take it with her.

I've taken Prof. Weinstein three times. She's very knowledgeable about the business and understands the essence of a great story. Her feedback helps students enhance their writing, while preventing them from feeling discouraged. I love the workshop format of the class. Assignments include 3 quizzes, 2 projects, and the script you've worked on.

A bit different than your average class but in a good way. The class material was well organized and easy to understand. If you enjoy watching/analyzing movies you will enjoy this class. The professor seems very passionate and caring, I personally learned a lot in terms of perspective.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! She is very generous and caring. She genuinely wants to see her students succeed. She works with students on their level and offers great advice. My classmates gush all the time about how great of a teacher she is. She is fun and is always concerned about the amount of work she gives her students.
